plot: Celebrity chef Michael Schulson make surprise visits to people's homes to show them how to prepare a meal using only the ingredients found in their pantry.
plot_en: Celebrity chef Michael Schulson make surprise visits to people's homes to show them how to prepare a meal using only the ingredients found in their pantry.
plot_es: Celebrity chef Michael Schulson make surprise visits to people's homes to show them how to prepare a meal using only the ingredients found in their pantry.
title: Pantry Raid
